SwitchPreference.android:summary: Set your GasaIQ supported soundcard to the max limits
Allows compander streams, which are stable but known to be battery draining and audio quality decreasing
SwitchPreference.android:title: Allow Compander

SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow BiQuads filtering, mostly used on telephony or ANC so caution if disabling them
SwitchPreference.android:title: Allow BiQuads
